amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 117-464 to ensure that a policy similar to Schedule F could be reinstated in the future by the President.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to ensure that a policy similar to Schedule F could be reinstated in the future by the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 226 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 226 (Roll no. 431).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hice (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 226 (Roll no. 431).
